page.description: Fires when the .removeRows() method is called before the rows are actually removed.

argument.name: rows
argument.description: A zero-based array of row numbers to be removed.

discussion.p: The *[js:onBeforeRemoveRows]* event is called before rows are removed after the *[js:<listObj>.removeRows()]* has been called. If the method returns false, the action is not performed. For example:
